title.rendered: Pete Davidson Makes First, Possibly Final Appearance on The Kardashians

content.rendered:
Some moments on The Kardashians capture moments that we already watched play out in the public sphere.

More than any other reality series, this family takes people behind the headlines and photo ops.

A lot more goes into the looks that they sport at red carpet events than most people might think.

Yes, that’s true even when the Kardashians don’t seem to really wow at the Met Gala.

On Season 2, Episode 9, we saw the buildup ahead of that red carpet event.

Kim felt nervous. And Pete Davidson was there to support her every step of the way. It was his first on-screen appearance on the show. But will it also be his last?
